Question: Raysolve Technology Company Limited CES 2024 product highlight and specification
Summary:
Raysolve Technology Company Limited

Product: Full-color Micro-LED Micro-displays

- Upgraded 0.11-inch and 0.22-inch full-color Micro-LED micro-displays
- Binocular full-color waveguide module
- Enables a brand new AR experience
- Completed Pre-Series A3 financing led by Meridian Capital, miHoYo, and 37 Interactive Entertainment
- Raised US$10 million in Pre-Series A+ and Pre-Series A++ financing led by Inno-chip, AAC Technologies, and Gaorong Capital
- Dedicated to R&D of Micro-LED micro-display technology
- Proprietary single-chip full-color micro-LED micro-displays for AR/MR applications
- Focus on lightweight, high brightness, full-color display, and durable battery life for consumer-level AR glasses
- Utilizes quantum dot color resist and monolithic integration technology for full-color display
- 8-inch wafer bonding technology for high-yield mass production
- Headquarters in Hong Kong, with a focus on semiconductor design, research, and manufacturing

Contact Information:
- (Suzhou) 2/F, Tower A2, Ascendas Innovation Park, No. 388 Xinping Street, Suzhou Industrial Park, Suzhou, China
- (Hong Kong) Room 07, Unit 602, Building 1E, Phase One, Hong Kong Science Park, No.1 Science Park East Avenue, Pak Shek Kok, New Territories, Hong Kong
- Email: info@raysolve.com
Summary_cn:
雷肃科技有限公司

产品：全彩微LED微显示器

- 升级的0.11英寸和0.22英寸全彩微LED微显示器
- 双目全彩光波导模块
- 实现全新的增强现实体验
- 由Meridian Capital、米哈游和37互动领导完成Pre-Series A3融资
- 在Inno-chip、AAC Technologies和高融资的领导下，完成了1000万美元的Pre-Series A+和Pre-Series A++融资
- 致力于微LED微显示技术的研发
- 为AR/MR应用开发专有的单芯片全彩微LED微显示器
- 专注于消费级AR眼镜的轻巧、高亮度、全彩显示和耐用电池寿命
- 利用量子点色彩抵抗和单片集成技术实现全彩显示
- 8英寸晶圆键合技术实现高产量大规模生产
- 总部位于香港，专注于半导体设计、研究和制造

联系信息：
- (苏州) 中国江苏省苏州市苏州工业园区新平街388号，新加坡创新园区A2座2楼
- (香港) 香港新界北角柏石角科学园东大街1号，一期1E幢602室
